Key Match Events: Andrew Benintendi tied his career high with his 20th homer in the 6th inning
Benintendi homered to right center in the 8th inning, scoring DeLoach
Post-Match Reflections: The White Sox beat the playoff-bound Tigers 4-0
The game ended with a final score of 4-0, with Sean Burke pitching two-hit ball over five innings
Andrew Benintendi tied his career high with his 20th homer and scored two runs
The White Sox stayed at 121 losses going into their season finale
Miscellaneous Highlights: Sean Burke pitched two-hit ball over five innings
Andrew Benintendi tied his career high with his 20th homer
Andrew Vaughn singled to left, scoring Benintendi in the 6th inning
Bryce DeLoach scored in the 8th inning on Benintendi's home run
